Or maybe i'm just being paranoid

topics.body: I may have said this before, but while Freddy vs. Jason is one of the dumbest slasher films I've ever seen it's als one of the best action films I've ever seen. Especially within that final thirty minutes with Freddy and Jason, the two biggest slasher icons, literally tearing each other to pieces. Freddy is a sadistic asshole who's just a blast to watch and Jason remains a stoic monsterous mass of pure unbridled death and destruction.
